ing: 1/2 cup rice vinegar or other white vinegar
1/3 cup Splenda no-calorie sweetener (or substitute sugar)
1 tablespoon finely minced jalapeno pepper, seeds and veins removed (optional)
des: "Pack in antioxidants. The ultimate in simplicity and refreshing taste, this coleslaw is flecked with green, red and yellow vegetables, the colors signifying the presence of antioxidants (cabbage is thought to have anti-cancer activity). I like its crispy, sweet-and-sour taste, unlike that of a creamy coleslaw."
